snippet.title: Cross Blitz - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Cross Blitz is an RPG deckbuilding game with strategic turn-based combat that offers zany tales of larger-than-life heroes, with each eccentric star boasting a unique playstyle and abilities. Throughout each hero’s adventure, players unlock new abilities and access to distant regions through cleverly fought battles, crafting and earning a trove of strategy-altering cards and perfecting decks customized to their preferred fighting styles. Cross Blitz is coming to PC later this year.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
